h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
content: In the secret area, you can fight Red Loong \- one of the many optional bosses in the game. Defeating him will drop a Mind Core.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Mind Core Location 3'.
The content is as follows:
In the secret area, you can fight Red Loong \- one of the many optional bosses in the game. Defeating him will drop a Mind Core.
